pathways.title: VASP Business Compliance & Licensing Pathway
pathways.description: For corporate entities, local or foreign, that offer services categorized under the VASP Act, transitioning from unlicensed operators to fully licensed financial institutions.

courses.title: Module 1: VASP Foundations and Regulatory Scope
courses.description: Establishes the legal mandate for VASP compliance, defining which activities require a license from the CMA or CBK.

courses.title: Module 2: Corporate Governance and Licensing Obligations
courses.description: Covers the strict requirements for VASP eligibility, focusing on financial soundness, leadership integrity, and physical presence in Kenya.

courses.title: Module 3: Operational Integrity and Risk Mitigation
courses.description: Ensures ongoing operational compliance, cybersecurity, and adherence to market conduct rules.

pathways.title: Individual User & Ecosystem Participation Pathway
pathways.description: For Retail Users and Aspiring Developers seeking to leverage the Crypsense ecosystem for financial health and skill certification.

courses.title: Module 1: Foundational Literacy, Safety, and Compliance
courses.description: Focuses on protecting the individual user from prevalent digital threats and ensuring personal compliance.

courses.title: Module 2: The Learn-to-Earn (LMS) Model and Micro-Task Economy
courses.description: Focuses on the user journey within the Crypsense Academy, where skills are certified and monetized.
